name: CapstoneCollegePlanningNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Parents of college-bound high school students are faced with many challenges today as they prepare for the college journey. Many face these challenges on their own by managing the process themselves. Others find the journey far different from their own college application experience and turn to professionals and experts along the way.

Experts in the business of assisting families with navigating their journey to college can be found in many cities across the United States. Independent Educational Consultants and Certified Educational Planners are growing in number. To find one near you, go to www.iecaonline.com or www.hecaonline.org.

Capstone Educational Consultants and Certified Educational Planner, Mark Cruver provides these fascinating, entertaining and educational updates, news and tips on the college journey.

For more information on Capstone Educational Consultants and Mark Cruver, go to www.capstoneed.com. Or, send us an email at info@capstoneeducationalconsultants.com
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
